contents.text: Thank you for calling MemSQL in San Francisco, the enterprise-scale database platform delivering real-time transactions and analytics in a single platform.
To speak with our sales team about enterprise licensing and demos, press '1'.
For pricing and enterprise licensing information, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for pricing and licensing.

navigationGoals: Get a quote for enterprise licensing and pricing tiers
I need to discuss enterprise licensing pricing and available discounts.
I want the pricing breakdown and license terms for your distributed in-memory analytics database.
I need someone to explain the cost and terms of the enterprise license.
I need pricing details for a campus-wide MemSQL license for our physics lab.

contents.text: For product demonstrations and trial access, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for a product demonstration.

navigationGoals: Arrange a product demo and activate a trial account
I want to arrange a live demo and access a free trial of your platform.
I need to schedule a trial and see a demo of your real-time transactional analytics platform.
I'd like to schedule a demo and get trial access to the platform.
I want to schedule a live demo and get trial access to test MemSQL for my research data.

contents.text: To reach customer support for technical help or billing, press '2'.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: Resolve a critical database connection error
I'm experiencing errors with my installation; I need technical support to troubleshoot.
I need troubleshooting assistance for slow query latency on our sharded nodes.
I'm having technical issues and need help troubleshooting.
My MemSQL trial instance won’t load my experimental datasets—connect me to technical support.

contents.text: For account management and billing inquiries, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Review my latest invoice and update payment details
I have questions about my latest invoice and need billing assistance.
I’d like to review last month’s invoice and update our enterprise subscription billing details.
I have questions about my bill and need help with my account.
I need an invoice and billing clarification for my student subscription.
